.
Using VA Form 21-674
As indicated in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.1.a
,
VA Form 21-674, Request for Approval of School Attendance
, is an acceptable prescribed form for a request to recognize schOOL children between the ages of 18 to 23 under the provisions of
38 CFR 3.57
for the purpose of payment of compensation, pension, or DIC.
Upon receipt of a request for benefits based on school attendance not submitted on the proper form attempt to contact the claimant via telephone to gather the information necessary to complete
VA Form 21-674
on behalf of the claimant, as described in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.4.j
, and
if attempts to contact the claimant via telephone are unsuccessful, document the phone call attempt as provided in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.D.1.e
, and handle the correspondence as a request for application in accordance with
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G.1
.
References
:  For more information on development requirements upon receipt of an incomplete request to add a dependent when the benefit is
compensation or DIC, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.5.d
, and
pension, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.6.b
.
